title: Bug 18705: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The issue is related to excessive flashing in the Control Example.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window vertically, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: The software should not display excessive flashing during window resizing in the Control Example.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Run the Control Example. 2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only. 3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
